metadata.name: Renamed NetSupport RAT Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a renamed "client32.exe" (NetSupport RAT) via Imphash, Product and OriginalFileName strings

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(metadata.product.name), lower('netsupport remote control')) AND contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('client32.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=a9d50692e95b79723f3e76fcf70d023e')) AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\client32.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a renamed "client32.exe" (NetSupport RAT) via Imphash, Product and OriginalFileName strings
